Introduction
This topic contains information on handling applications for specific types of claims, including
reviewing
VA Form 21-2680
to identify claims for SMC or SMP
, and
for claims for spousal or survivors’ A&A or housebound benefits
issues that arise from consideration of
VA Forms 21-2680, 21-4502,
or
26-4555, Application in Acquiring Specially Adapted Housing or Special Home Adaptation Grant
handling requests for P&T status for compensation
, and
non-discretionary application of 38 CFR 3.152(b)
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Applications for Benefits
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
